title: Nation proud of Arshad Nadeem’s performance: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 07 (APP):Federal Minister of Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain said on Saturday that Pakistani nation was proud of Arshad Nadeem’s performance in the Tokyo Olympics.
#ArshadNadeem, thank you for giving us hope and taking us this far. Pakistan is proud of you. #Olympics
— Ch Fawad Hussain (@fawadchaudhry) August 7, 2021
In a tweet, Chaudhry Fawad thanked athlete Arshad Nadeem who created hope in the nation.
